reporter_caption.center: ORDER AMENDING THE ARIZONA TAX COURT, R-02-0030 (Ariz. 2003)

caption.center: ORDER AMENDING THE ARIZONA TAX COURT RULES OF PRACTICE

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER IT IS ORDERED amending the Arizona Tax Court Rules of Practice and adopting a Correlation Table, as set forth in the attachment hereto, effective as of June 1, 2003.
DATED in the City of Phoenix, Arizona at the Arizona Courts Building, this 24th day of January, 2003.
For the Court:
__________________________ CHARLES E. JONES Chief Justice
